Articles.Content:
Hey, sorry to bother. I've recently gotten into KSP again after a short break due to constant RAM crashes (I got more RAM, this isn't the problem), and have several mods. Now, the problem. I'm trying to create a craft using the Spaceplane+ Procedural Wing, and the Spaceplane + parts that were recently integrated into the latest update of KSP. Whenever I place one of the now stock parts onto my Procedural Wing, the toolbar (plugin) disappears and the game freezes up. The cursor even freezes and I have to Alt+Tab to get out of the game window. I can't close the game unless I shut down my PC. I'd greatly appreciate any fix for this, and I would post on the PWing thread, but it may not be the problem here, as I've never had any problem like this. Anyway, any help is appreciated.

P.S. the game doesn't register as crashing, so there is no log for it as far as I know.

EDIT: A completely unrelated problem, aswell. There seems to be duplicates to the stock parts. Some have different values, but all stock command pods mess up the clicking of the game, and once I click on the root part it won't let me unclick it. I cannot exit, and must Alt+Tab. Would you guys just recommend a clean KSP install and add mods one by one to see what is the problem?

Edited November 7, 2014 by Chezburgar7300
Added a bit.

EDIT: A completely unrelated problem, aswell. There seems to be duplicates to the stock parts. Some have different values, but all stock command pods mess up the clicking of the game, and once I click on the root part it won't let me unclick it. I cannot exit, and must Alt+Tab. Would you guys just recommend a clean KSP install and add mods one by one to see what is the problem?

Yes, that will probably be your best bet, though following all the instructions in the "How to get support" sticky thread (mod list and output_log.txt) may also help...
